title: PESU GANG, don't make the Seniors rebel against you!

comments.body: Remember, we are the reason why there's no IIT Bangalore 😭😂
haha that works both ways - IIT brand is so afraid of coming to bangalore thanks to pesu

Lord of the rings extended version ?

"Arise, arise, riders of RVCE!
Fell deeds awake, fire and slaughter!
Spear shall be shaken, shield be splintered!
A sword-day, a red day, ere the LIBRARY is OURS?
Ride now, ride now, ride to RVU!”

Bro thinks he is Dwight Schrute

![gif](giphy|FDITqxKuHCIp1T5Kjf)
I can hear the theme playing in background
My memory sucks, but kahi to dekha hai tujhe
Also proves that PESU seniors >>> other college seniors. We might shit on you for being annoying but you're our annoyance 🤗
Maybe, I am kinda shy so I delete all my comments.
vc said once that - there is no IIT in bangalore because there is PES university - absolutely motherduckingly comical
\+1, Honestly didn't get any clue what was going on from the post.

facts, pesu seniors have been so nice man, my friends in vit and mit and even iits talk about getting bullied by seniors and being encouraged at do dumb shit, seniors here have helped so much in getting us used to the place.
